metadata.synopsis: One-liner with masked Quenora while she is under hag mind-control.Quenora can only be talked to by a player char if it wears a hag mask, otherwise Quenora attacks on sight.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/CTY_Main_A- Debugbook option "Act3 → LOW - Auntie Ethel's Revenge → Hag was defeated in Act I- Equip one of the hag masks found here, -2355; 4; -126- Talk to masked Quenora, -122; 26; -95

0.speaker: Captain Grisly
0.text: Auntie promised me treasure. I'm gonna be rich, so rich.
0.context: NodeContext: Dreamy and out of it - voice is filled with love and adoration for the hag

1.speaker: Captain Grisly
1.text: Auntie is so kind. I love her. I love her so much.
1.context: NodeContext: Dreamy and out of it - voice is filled with love and adoration for the hag
